Topic.Title: How to change the page text if you die?

Posts.EditableText:
I need help. I don't know how to change the text when your character has zero hp. 
For example, i'm playing this random RPG squiffy game, and then when i'm fighting my hp gets reduced to zero or below zero, then when you finish fighting or go onto the next page, it says 'game over' instead of 'you got through the fight!' or something.
Posts.HTML:
I need help. I don't know how to change the text when your character has zero hp.
For example, i'm playing this random RPG squiffy game, and then when i'm fighting my hp gets reduced to zero or below zero, then when you finish fighting or go onto the next page, it says 'game over' instead of 'you got through the fight!' or something.

I have a suggestion, if you use the curly brackets({}) using the ‘if’ and ‘else’ command, you can do something like this

I have a random number in mind
{rotate guess:1:2:3:4:5:6:6:7:8:9}
+++Guess
{if guess<>4:try again}
{if guess=4:Mind reader!}

I used this method for a passcode in my Squiffy and it works
